about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through space. Select the perfect ship to match your style and strategy, then arm it to the teeth against your adversaries. Explore uncharted territories filled with surprises and challenges. Engage in diplomacy, trade, or conflict with diverse civilizations, each with its own customs and agenda. Forge alliances, negotiate treaties, or engage in epic battles as you navigate through complex interstellar politics.

Game Features:
1. TOP-DOWN GAMEPLAY - Navigate your way in a top-down spacefaring adventure.
2. CUSTOMIZE YOUR SHIP - An array of weapons and defenses, tailored to your unique playstyle awaits your deployment.
3. A PLETHORA OF CONTENTS - From sprawling space cities to floating colonies, mining facilities, research stations, military installations, secret hideouts and hundreds of different spaceships and more.
4. DIVERSE ENCOUNTERS - Various creatures, aliens and human races scattered among the stars. Interact and carry out their missions, expand their dominion and gain favor to join their circle, but beware, for with each act of aggression, you invite retaliation from powerful foes bent on revenge.
5. EXPERIENCE TRUE FREEDOM - Have the freedom to complete hundreds of objectives in any order or manner you prefer. When it’s time for a break from government contracts, you can go exploring the cosmos on your own.
6. DISCOVER THE SECRETS OF THE COSMOS - From hidden zones to mysterious objects, experience random events and discover the secrets of the Triangulum Galaxy.
7. LIVE THE HIGH LIFE - Raid merchant and transport ships for loot, pillage floating colonies, harrass military bases, smuggle precious contrabands, escape or assist the authorities, take out whole empires, and more.

short_description: Steer your ship, explore the vast expanse of space, trade for resources, pillage ships and colonies for precious loot. Carry out tasks for various faction governments vying for domination. Would you be a freelancing privateer, or pledge allegiance to a faction and carry out their sinister agenda?
